name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Yapily
description: This is a repository of yapily APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Yapily
apis.description: Yapily is how people connect to banks, easily! We are an API Only technology provider whose mission is to enable innovative products to connect to banks, empowering a new generation of financial services.
